description:
The entire platoon gets sent to Sengoku Ran Star to find a legendary Keronian treasure.  But the sixth son of the Viper clan is out to stop them.  While undercover as warriors from the Warring States period, can the Keroro Platoon prevail?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 武者ケロ 壱の巻 伝説の勇者 でござ候
